message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of it right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident you'll see the potential in this product as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully.  Let me know your decision.
